amendment.description: To make a technical correction to section 132 of title I of division J of Public Law 114-113.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3938 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3938 proposed by Senator Kirk to Amendment SA 3896. (consideration: CR S2869; text: CR S2869) To make a technical correction to section 132 of title I of division J of Public Law 114-113.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3938 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3938 proposed by Senator Kirk to Amendment SA 3896.
